author: lightclient
content:
i listened to some of the recording, sorry i didn't make it either. there is clearly demand to revamp the execution-apis and i for one am very interested and excited in having some other step up into a maintainer role!

reposting what i posted elsewhere, but unfortunately the execution-apis repo hasn't been my highest priority for the last year or so. i've tried in the past to find someone to elevate to maintainer status as i have not been as active on the repo as the repo needs, but have not found anyone to do this.

there is definitely more work here than just merging the PRs, there are several moving pieces, e.g. hive, rpctestgen, the spec frontend, and engaging client teams. i think to do this right it is at least a part time job, at least in the beginning.

anyone interested in stepping into this role, feel free to dm and we can chat. 

i think prio #1 for the repo is to get the website moved over to docusaurus since the current version doesn't work well and can't really be tested locally

author: lightclient
content: there is also a contributing guide linked in the readme: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/docs/making-changes.md
